thread.title: Police Closed In on Bomber After Following Trail of Clues

author: Russell Gold
title: Police Closed In on Bomber After Following Trail of Clues
text:
PFLUGERVILLE, Texasâ€”Days before Mark Anthony Conditt blew himself up alongside an interstate near Austin on Wednesday morning, investigators had zeroed in on him, believing he was the serial bomber whose lethal handiwork had terrorized the city.
The 23-year-old suspect had evaded capture for nearly three weeks as he left a path of package bombs across the Texas capital, killing two and injuring several more. The attacks had rattled the city. Its residents called police hundreds of times over suspicious packages and grew increasingly...
